Nice link to my Flock OSCON demo review as well as mentions of fellow Bryght guys Boris and Kris. flock as "Social Web 2.0 Office" sounds great. Makes sense since it is cross platform and works (or will hopefully work with any cool Web 2.0 service and app that has APIs; that's the intent and promise but it's still early days) with everything unlike Microsoft Office.
